summary: Midland Gate Shopping Centre, having undergone a $500-550 million capital raising expansion and redevelopment, is 100% owned by CapitaLand and Singapore Fund and the AGD Joint Venture, with plans for a further transformative overhaul prior to its full opening. The current iteration of the shopping centre offers a diverse range of retailers and attractions, varying across the spectrum of luxury, premium, mid-tier, and discount brands to cater to the diverse needs of its clientele.
